      • addTitle

        public void addTitle(int id,
            int x,
            int y,
            TextFont textFont,
            java.lang.String align,
            int angdeg,
            boolean airType,
            int maxLength)
        Places Anime Title on the image
        Parameters:
        id - the Anime order number
        x -
        y -
        textFont -
        align - left, center, or right
        angdeg - degrees to rotate clockwise
        airType - if should display the tpye of show (TV/Movie/OVA)
        maxLength - the maximum number of characters the title is

      • makeText

        public java.awt.image.BufferedImage makeText(java.lang.String text,
                                    int x,
                                    int y,
                                    TextFont textFont,
                                    java.lang.String align,
                                    double angdeg)
        Creates transparent image with text composited. Total image will be the same as the Signature. Allows text to be filtered, then later to added to Signature with addImage()
        Parameters:
        text -
        x -
        y -
        textFont -
        align - left, center, or right
        angdeg - degrees to rotate clockwise
